name: notebooklm-mcp (PleasePrompto)
description: [项目级] MCP server for NotebookLM - Let your AI agents (Claude Code, Codex) research documentation directly with grounded, citation-backed answers from Gemini. Persistent auth, library management, cross-client sharing. Zero hallucinations, just your knowledge base.。来源: https://github.com/PleasePrompto/notebooklm-mcp

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
MCP server for NotebookLM - Let your AI agents (Claude Code, Codex) research documentation directly with grounded, citation-backed answers from Gemini. Persistent auth, library management, cross-client sharing. Zero hallucinations, just your knowledge base.

来源: https://github.com/PleasePrompto/notebooklm-mcp
语言: TypeScript
Stars: 954

name: notebooklm-mcp/docs 模块
description: [模块级] notebooklm-mcp 项目的 docs 模块 (docs)。来源: https://github.com/PleasePrompto/notebooklm-mcp

genes.title: docs 模块说明
genes.content:
- **You**: Download docs → Claude: "search through these files"
- **Problem**: Claude reads thousands of files → massive token usage, often misses connections
- **NotebookLM**: Pre-indexed by Gemini, semantic understanding across all docs
